name: unindexed_foreign_keys
title: Unindexed foreign keys
description: Identifies foreign key constraints without a covering index, which can impact database performance.
detail: Table \`public.assignments\` has a foreign key \`assignments_class_id_fkey\` without a covering index. This can lead to suboptimal query performance.
